ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup homemade or purchased pesto

cookingTips: Scoop out tomato insides gently using a small spoon to maintain structural integrity
Reserve tomato pulp to mix into pesto for enhanced flavor and moisture
Bake at 350°F for 15-20 minutes until tomatoes soften and cheese browns slightly
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you serve these as an elegant appetizer versus a side dish?
